name: Dmitry Zelenchuk
content: Dmitry Zelenchuk - Queen's University Belfast View Scopus Profile Dmitry Zelenchuk Dr Senior Lecturer, School of Electronics, Electrical Engineering and Computer ScienceHigh Frequency Electronic CircuitsInstitute of Electronics, Communications & Information Technology https://orcid.org/0000-0003-2866-6296 Phone+44 (0)28 9097 1761Emaild.zelenchukqub.acuk Room 01.027 - Queens Titanic Quarter (QTQ)United Kingdom Accepting PhD StudentsPhD projects- Reconfigurable Intelligent Surfaces- 6G physical layer technologies- mm-wave antennas and systems- Wideband millimetre wave imaging antenna- Automotive radar sensor antenna system 20012025 Research activity per year Personal profile Research InterestsElectromagnetic field theory, material characterization, millimeter-wave circuits, antennas, and advanced packaging, propagation in complex environments, and various physical phenomena of plasmonic and nanostructuresAchievementsAuthored and co-authored more than 100 journal and conference papers, book chapters. Had been a session chair at scientific conferences. Dr Zelenchuk received the medal of the Ministry of Education of the Russian Federation “For the Best Scientific Student Paper” in 2001.
